author: Staff Reporter
text:
A 46-year-old man and his wife were killed and three others sustained injuries when the car they were travelling in hit a truck from behind near Karisalkulam under Kayathar police limits on Thursday.

The deceased were identified as G. Santhosh Kumar (46) of Kattur, Tiruchi, and his wife Meenakumari (44). Their children Suriya (10) and Vaideki (8) and car driver N. Muruganandam (28) of Vijayagopalapuram, Perambur, were injured and admitted to Tirunelveli Government Medical College Hospital.

Based on a complaint lodged by K. Krishnabalan (53) of KK Nagar, Tiruchi, a relative of the deceased, Kayathar police have registered a case.
title: Couple killed
